Description.Details: An upgrade to the ageing 68 model, this Mongoose was one of the first models to trial the Combines new C3 Slave unit. Featuring a characteristically minimalist upgrade package, this Mongoose variant served with distinction during Operation Bulldog. An ER Large Laser servers as the sole weapons system, augmented by a new fire control system and the C3 unit. A cheap upgrade, this is a favourite of pilots who were previously assigned a 68; with many praising the enhanced range and accuracy of the Laser. Paired into demi lances, and assigned a C3 Master equipped mech to coordinate, these Mongoose's are deployed as head hunters and long range harassers; both roles that make use of their high ground speed and manoeuvrability. Fast and deadly, they have already made a name for themselves, with one Mongoose formation accounting for 5 kills, including a Star Colonel in a Timberwolf during the Great Refusal.
Description.Name: Mongoose
